message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for a product worth much more. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further. How about $11,000? This is my final offer before I move on to other buyers.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,500.
Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway. My final offer is $10,750. This is a good price for both of us, and I don't want to waste any more time with negotiations.  Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I am willing to consider $10,600 as a fair price for the product.
